title: Bodum Assam 2 Piece Small Tea Glass with Steel Handle, 10 oz, Chrome
features: They are made from borosilicate glass, which is light and robust at the same time and dishwasher safe
On top of that, borosilicate glass doesn't cloud - not even after years of dishwasher use
The glasses' handles are made from stainless steel
The ASSAM is a classic tea and coffee glass to go beautifully with any of our tea and coffee pots
description: Drinking coffee and tea out of a glass cup instead of porcelain can feel like a double treat. It's your eyes helping your taste buds to anticipate the specific flavor of your favorite brew at the exact strength you desire. With our ASSAM glasses transparency is a beautiful thing!.
